sentences.en: a shampoo designed to keep your hair in peak condition
sentences.cn: 令秀发保持最佳状态的洗发水

sentences.en: Athletes have to train continuously to stay in peak condition.
sentences.cn: 运动员必须不断训练才能保持最佳竞技状态.

sentences.en: Calls cost 36p (cheap rate) and 48p (peak rate) per minute.
sentences.cn: 电话每分钟36便士（优惠费率）和48便士（高峰费率）。

sentences.en: Gasoline prices are 14% below the peak level they hit in November.
sentences.cn: 汽油价格比11月的最高点下跌了14%。

sentences.en: He’s past his peak as a tennis player.
sentences.cn: 作为网球运动员他已过了巅峰期。

sentences.en: If you phone during the day you pay the peak rate for calls.
sentences.cn: 白天打电话要支付高峰时段电话费。

sentences.en: It was a time of peak demand for the product.
sentences.cn: 那是对该产品需求最旺的时期。

sentences.en: jagged peaks
sentences.cn: 嶙峋的山峰

sentences.en: Middle school enrollments will peak this year.
sentences.cn: 今年中学入学人数将达到高峰.

sentences.en: Most athletes reach their peak in their mid 20s.
sentences.cn: 大多数运动员在25岁左右达到巅峰状态。

sentences.en: Oil production is down from its peak of two years ago.
sentences.cn: 石油生产已比不上两年前的鼎盛时期。

sentences.en: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentences.cn: 山顶上升气流强度随速矢端迹曲率加大而稍有加强.

sentences.en: periods of peak demand for electricity
sentences.cn: 用电需求高峰时段

sentences.en: Sales peaked in August, then fell sharply.
sentences.cn: 销售额8月份达到最高点，然后急速下降。

sentences.en: Sales this month have reached a new peak .
sentences.cn: 本月的销售额创了新高。

sentences.en: snow-capped mountain peaks
sentences.cn: 白雪覆盖的山顶

sentences.en: Temperatures have peaked at over 90 degrees.
sentences.cn: 温度已达到峰值，超过了90度。

sentences.en: That peak is dominant over all other hills.
sentences.cn: 那个山峰俯瞰群山.

sentences.en: The 8844 - metre peak stabbed the sky.
sentences.cn: 这座8844米高的山峰直插云霄.

sentences.en: The man touched the peak of his cap.
sentences.cn: 那名男子摸了摸他的帽舌。

sentences.en: The news programme goes out four times a week at peak time.
sentences.cn: 这档新闻节目每周在黄金时段播出4次。

sentences.en: The peak towers up into the clouds.
sentences.cn: 那座山峰高耸入云.

sentences.en: the peaks and troughs of the US economy (= high and low points )
sentences.cn: 美国经济的起起落落

sentences.en: The snowy main peak towers above all the others.
sentences.cn: 白雪皑皑的主峰高耸在群峦之上.

sentences.en: This white peak contrasts finely with the blue sky.
sentences.cn: 雪白的山峰同蔚蓝的天空交相辉映.

sentences.en: Traffic reaches its peak between 8 and 9 in the morning.
sentences.cn: 上午8、9点钟之间是交通高峰期。

sentences.en: Unemployment among married women reached a peak.
sentences.cn: 在已婚女性中失业率达到了峰值.

sentences.en: Unemployment amongst married women reached a peak.
sentences.cn: 在已婚女性中失业率达到了顶峰.

sentences.en: We saw peak beyond peak.
sentences.cn: 我们看到山峰迭起.

sentences.en: Whisk the egg whites until they form stiff peaks.
sentences.cn: 将蛋清搅打至起尖发稠。

words.tran_cn: 到达高点，消瘦，竖起（peak的过去式和过去分词形式）
山峰；最高点；顶点；[服装]帽舌
消瘦；到达最高点；变憔悴

phrases.tran_cn: 峰值加速度；最大加速度值
峰值压力；巅峰压力；最大压力
反峰电压；反向峰值电压
峰值负载抑制；高峰调节
（收听广播、收看电视的）高峰时间
峰值电压；峰压；最大电压

trans.tran_en: used to talk about the best, highest, or greatest level or amount of something
the time when something or someone is best, greatest, highest, most successful etc
When something peaks, it reaches its highest value or its highest level
to reach the highest point or level
